verses.verse: When <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall bring <WH935> you into <WH413> the land <WH776> where <WH834> <WH8033> you go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, and has cast <WH5394> out many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> you, the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Girgashites, <WH1622> and the Amorites, <WH567> and the Canaanites, <WH3669> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Hivites, <WH2340> and the Jebusites, <WH2983> seven <WH7651> nations <WH1471> greater <WH7227> and mightier <WH6099> than you;

And when the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall deliver <WH5414> them before <WH6440> you; you shall smite <WH5221> them, and utterly destroy <WH2763> them; you shall make <WH3772> no <WH3808> covenant <WH1285> with them, nor <WH3808> show mercy <WH2603> to them:

Neither <WH3808> shall you make marriages <WH2859> with them; your daughter <WH1323> you shall not give <WH5414> to his son, <WH1121> nor <WH3808> his daughter <WH1323> shall you take <WH3947> to your son. <WH1121>

For they will turn <WH5493> away your son <WH1121> from following <WH310> me, that they may serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods: <WH430> so will the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> be kindled <WH2734> against you, and destroy <WH8045> you suddenly. <WH4118>

But thus <WH3541> shall you deal <WH6213> with them; you shall destroy <WH5422> their altars, <WH4196> and break <WH7665> down their images, <WH4676> and cut <WH1438> down their groves, <WH842> and burn <WH8313> their graven <WH6456> images with fire. <WH784>

For you are an holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> to the LORD <WH3068> your God: <WH430> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has chosen <WH977> you to be a special <WH5459> people <WH5971> to himself, above all <WH3605> people <WH5971> that are on the face <WH6440> of the earth. <WH127>

The LORD <WH3068> did not set his love <WH2836> on you, nor <WH3808> choose <WH977> you, because you were more <WH7230> in number than any <WH3605> people; <WH5971> for you were the fewest <WH4592> of all <WH3605> people: <WH5971>

But because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> loved <WH160> you, and because he would keep <WH8104> the oath <WH7621> which <WH834> he had sworn <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> has the LORD <WH3068> brought <WH3318> you out with a mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and redeemed <WH6299> you out of the house <WH1004> of slaves, <WH5650> from the hand <WH3027> of Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt. <WH4714>

Know <WH3045> therefore that the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> he is God, <WH430> the faithful <WH539> God, <WH410> which <WH834> keeps <WH8104> covenant <WH1285> and mercy <WH2617> with them that love <WH157> him and keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687> to a thousand <WH505> generations; <WH1755>

And repays <WH7999> them that hate <WH8130> him to their face, <WH6440> to destroy <WH6> them: he will not be slack <WH309> to him that hates <WH8130> him, he will repay <WH7999> him to his face. <WH6440>
You shall therefore keep <WH8104> the commandments, <WH4687> and the statutes, <WH2706> and the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> to do <WH6213> them.

Why it shall come <WH1961> to pass, if <WH6118> you listen <WH8085> to these <WH428> judgments, <WH4941> and keep, <WH8104> and do <WH6213> them, that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall keep <WH8104> to you the covenant <WH1285> and the mercy <WH2617> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to your fathers: <WH1>

And he will love <WH157> you, and bless <WH1288> you, and multiply <WH7235> you: he will also bless <WH1288> the fruit <WH6529> of your womb, <WH990> and the fruit <WH6529> of your land, <WH127> your corn, <WH1715> and your wine, <WH8492> and your oil, <WH3323> the increase <WH7698> of your cows, <WH504> and the flocks <WH6251> of your sheep, <WH6629> in the land <WH127> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> you.
You shall be blessed <WH1288> above all <WH3605> people: <WH5971> there shall not be male or female barren <WH6135> among you, or among your cattle. <WH929>

And the LORD <WH3068> will take <WH5493> away from you all <WH3605> sickness, <WH2483> and will put <WH7760> none <WH3808> of the evil <WH7451> diseases <WH4064> of Egypt, <WH4714> which <WH834> you know, <WH3045> on you; but will lay <WH5414> them on all <WH3605> them that hate <WH8130> you.

And you shall consume <WH398> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall deliver <WH5414> you; your eye <WH5869> shall have no <WH3808> pity <WH2347> on them: neither <WH3808> shall you serve <WH5647> their gods; <WH430> for that will be a snare <WH4170> to you.
If <WH3588> you shall say <WH559> in your heart, <WH3824> These <WH428> nations <WH1471> are more <WH7227> than I; how <WH349> can <WH3201> I dispossess <WH3423> them?

You shall not be afraid <WH3372> of them: but shall well remember <WH2142> what <WH853> <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> did <WH6213> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and to all <WH3605> Egypt; <WH4714>

The great <WH1419> temptations <WH4531> which <WH834> your eyes <WH5869> saw, <WH7200> and the signs, <WH226> and the wonders, <WH4159> and the mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and the stretched <WH5186> out arm, <WH2220> whereby <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> brought <WH3318> you out: so <WH3651> shall the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> do <WH6213> to all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of whom <WH834> <WH6440> you are afraid. <WH3373>

Moreover <WH1571> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> will send <WH7971> the hornet <WH6880> among them, until <WH5704> they that are left, <WH7604> and hide <WH5641> themselves from you, be destroyed. <WH6>
You shall not be affrighted <WH6206> at <WH6440> them: for the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> is among <WH7130> you, a mighty <WH1419> God <WH410> and terrible. <WH3372>

And the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> will put <WH5394> out those <WH411> nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> you by little <WH4592> and little: <WH4592> you may <WH3201> not consume <WH3615> them at <WH4118> once, <WH4118> lest <WH6435> the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> increase <WH7235> on you.
But the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall deliver <WH5414> them to you, and shall destroy <WH2000> them with a mighty <WH1419> destruction, <WH4103> until <WH5704> they be destroyed. <WH8045>

And he shall deliver <WH5414> their kings <WH4428> into your hand, <WH3027> and you shall destroy <WH6> their name <WH8034> from under <WH8478> heaven: <WH8064> there shall no <WH3808> man <WH375> be able <WH3320> to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> you, until <WH5704> you have destroyed <WH8045> them.

The graven <WH6456> images of their gods <WH430> shall you burn <WH8313> with fire: <WH784> you shall not desire <WH2530> the silver <WH3701> or gold <WH2091> that is on <WH5921> them, nor take <WH3947> it to you, lest <WH6435> you be snared <WH3369> therein: for it is an abomination <WH8441> to the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

Neither <WH3808> shall you bring <WH935> an abomination <WH8441> into <WH413> your house, <WH1004> lest you be a cursed <WH2764> thing like <WH3644> it: but you shall utterly detest <WH8262> it, and you shall utterly abhor <WH8581> it; for it is a cursed <WH2764> thing.
